subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire will be banging with the Magic’s 275-pound center, Dwight Howard, even though he really sees himself as a power forward.
snippet: The Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire will be banging with the Magic’s 275-pound center, Dwight Howard, even though he really sees himself as a power forward.
